description: She’s speaking facts! I knew there was a reason I hated social studies growing up in school because it was all lies! It’s all apart of the Rockefeller school system design to lie about the true history of the Amerikkka and maintain white superiority! It’s not your fault, it’s the lies they fed us and continue to feed our children. They don’t even teach about slavery anymore because they want the new generation to feel like Amerikkka doesn’t have a dark past and all the whites were superheroes in history! I’m not trying to cause division, because at the end of the day I still love everyone! I’m making you think!  #hollyweirdisevil
